suggestions.name: Heading
suggestions.documentation: Add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase. The number of number signs you use should correspond to the heading level.

suggestions.name: Bold
suggestions.documentation: Add two asterisks before and after a word or phrase.

suggestions.name: Italic
suggestions.documentation: Add one asterisk before and after a word or phrase.

suggestions.name: Blockquote
suggestions.documentation: Add a > in front of a paragraph.

suggestions.name: List (Ordered)
suggestions.documentation: Add numbers followed by periods in front of line items.

suggestions.name: List (Unordered)
suggestions.documentation: Add dashes (-) in front of line items.

suggestions.name: Code
suggestions.documentation: Code blocks are normally indented four spaces or one tab. When they’re in a list, indent them eight spaces or two tabs.

suggestions.name: Line
suggestions.documentation: To create a Line (horizontal rule), use three dashes (---)

suggestions.name: Link
suggestions.documentation: To create a link, enclose the link text in brackets (e.g., [Duck Duck Go]) and then follow it immediately with the URL in parentheses (e.g., (https://duckduckgo.com)).

suggestions.name: Image
suggestions.documentation: To add an image, add an exclamation mark (!), followed by alt text in brackets, and the path or URL to the image asset in parentheses.

suggestions.name: Diagram - Sequence
suggestions.syntax:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
John-->>Alice: Great!
Alice-)John: See you later!
```

suggestions.name: Code Blocks
suggestions.documentation: Use three backticks (```) on the lines before and after the code block

suggestions.name: Table
suggestions.syntax:
| header1 | header2 |
| --- | --- |
| cell1 | cell2 |
| cell3 | cell4 |
suggestions.documentation: To add a table, use three or more hyphens (---) to create each column’s header, and use pipes (|) to separate each column.

suggestions.name: Strikethrough
suggestions.documentation: Add ~~ before and after a word or phrase.

suggestions.name: Task List
suggestions.documentation: preface list items with a hyphen and space followed by [ ]. To mark a task as complete, use [x].
